title:
Isn\'t there a fine for throwing cigarette butts out of car windows?  If so, how much AND, if so, would it be possible for law enforcement officers to do some passing out of fines on a stretch of road to bring this to attention...kind of like the DWI stops?

Thanks,

Kate
